name: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil
Cook spaghetti according to package directions
While pasta cooks, fry pancetta in a large skillet until crispy
In a bowl, whisk together egg yolks, whole egg, and cheese
Reserve 1 cup pasta water, then drain pasta
Add hot pasta to pancetta skillet, remove from heat
Quickly stir in egg mixture, adding pasta water to create creamy sauce
Season with black pepper and serve immediately
notes: The key is to work quickly and off heat to prevent eggs from scrambling. The residual heat will cook the eggs perfectly.
